text: tanage sanmargavu bahala spastavagi manavarikeyada balikavu, (allahana) dutarannu virodhisuva hagu visvasigala margada badalu berenannadaru anusarisuva vyaktiyannu navu, avanu enannu avalambisiruvano adara vasakke oppisi bidutteve mattu navu atanannu narakadolage eseyaliddeve. Adu bahala ketta nele
